Posts.Content: I am 41 and diagnosed Jan. 9 2012 with stage 2 Micropapillary Inavasive Duct Cancer with a 5cm tumor and 4 nodes tested positive by biopsy already.. I am 2mths into my chemo treatment and was just looking for anyone who may have the same type of Cancer I can share information with.. My doctor recommended treatment first for 6mths worth of chemo then a double mastectomy afterwards..
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with Stage 2 Micropapillary Inavasive Duct Cancer
